step.title: Data Collection and Initial Inventory
step.goal: Execute data collection from user submitted files ensuring data existence and reliability. Artifacts: Data inventory checklist, raw dataset file verification; Acceptance: os.path.exists('./assets/housing.csv')==True and pd.read_csv('./assets/housing.csv').shape[0]>0.

verified_artifacts.variable: Inventory report of data files, text-based, completeness verification standards
Raw housing dataset loaded into memory, dataframe type, non-empty standards

required_variables.variable: List of submitted files, external source

pcs_considerations.predictability: Ensures presence of necessary data for modeling and hypothesis testing.
pcs_considerations.computability: Establishes reproducible data loading steps and file verification logic.
pcs_considerations.stability: Mitigates risks of missing or corrupted data through completeness checks.

step.title: Exploring Data Structure and Organization
step.goal: Analyze the structure of the housing dataset to identify columns, data types, and organizational hierarchy. Artifacts: Data structure report; Acceptance: Columns=['longitude','latitude','housing_median_age','total_rooms',...] and all(pd.api.types.is_dtype(df[col]) for col in df.columns).

verified_artifacts.variable: Detailed overview of dataset columns, data types, and hierarchy, text-based standards

required_variables.variable: Loaded housing dataset dataframe, analysis input source

pcs_considerations.predictability: Defines a clear organizational context for data exploration and predictive modeling.
pcs_considerations.computability: Facilitates efficient and systematic data structure analysis steps.
pcs_considerations.stability: Ensures robustness against inconsistent or incorrect data formatting.

step.title: Variable Semantic Interpretation
step.goal: Map the semantics of each dataset column to business concepts and assess measurement scales. Artifacts: Variable semantic dictionary; Acceptance: len(variable_mapping)==len(df.columns) and all([type(scale) in [str, tuple] for scale in scales]).

verified_artifacts.variable: Mapping of columns to business concepts, dictionary type, business logic alignment
Scales and ranges of each dataset variable, dictionary type

required_variables.variable: Overview of dataset structure and columns, analysis input source

pcs_considerations.predictability: Identifies meaningfully interpretable variables for downstream predictive modeling.
pcs_considerations.computability: Ensures a standard semantic framework linking machine-readable data to domain knowledge.
pcs_considerations.stability: Promotes robustness in modeling by accounting for variable scale sensitivity.

step.title: Define Observation Units and Unique Identifiers
step.goal: Identify observation unit types and ensure uniqueness within the dataset. Artifacts: Observation unit definition document; Acceptance: len(set(df.index)) == len(df.index) and 'observation_unit_type' in globals().

verified_artifacts.variable: Detailed description of observation types, text-based
List of unique keys identifying observations, list type

required_variables.variable: Overview of dataset structure and relationships, source

pcs_considerations.predictability: Enables clear identification of data representativeness and observation uniqueness.
pcs_considerations.computability: Provides consistent methods for indexing and accessing data observations.
pcs_considerations.stability: Improves data utility by ensuring robust observation unit definitions.

step.title: Evaluate Variable Relevance
step.goal: Assess relationships between variables and their relevance to predicting housing prices. Artifacts: Variable analysis report; Acceptance: len(relevant_variables) > 5 and sorted(relevance_scores, reverse=True)[0] >= threshold.

verified_artifacts.variable: List of variable importance metrics, numerical standards
Filtered list of predictive variable names, list type

required_variables.variable: Housing dataset loaded into memory, input source
Semantic mappings for understanding variables, source

pcs_considerations.predictability: Ensures identification of impactful predictive variables aligned with domain logic.
pcs_considerations.computability: Enables systematic computational ranking of variable importance via quantitative metrics.
pcs_considerations.stability: Validates robustness by analyzing complementary and redundant variable effects.

steps.focus: Each step is focused on ensuring that data required for predictive modeling of housing prices is comprehensively inventoried, structurally analyzed, semantically mapped, uniquely identified, and effectively connected with PSC considerations, enabling later stages with ideal inputs.
steps.goals: Establish the confidence of foundational dataset correctness by ensuring all initial checks, validations, mappings, and interpretations are complete and quality compliant.
